inputContent: Have feedback? Use the button below to submit completely anonymous feedback to the officer team!
promptContent: Just reply to this message with what you want to say and I'll make sure the officer team gets it, totally anonymously! If you change your mind, don't worry--you can just ignore this message and I won't be offended.
confirmContent: Alright, received loud and clear! I've sent your thoughts on to the officers! If you think of anything, feel free to just shoot me another message!
